== Local Commercial User Scenario ==

# A Local commercial user is a cooperation like Doydos , Taksim Burger etc.

# Commercial Users may offer a game which awards discount etc.

# Commercial game creation are not free. In order to start a game they have to pay it.

# CGM, Commercial Game Master, creates a game by using Commercial Game Wizard.

#Cevahir AVM is a CGM.

# CGM chooses the place where the game will be played from google map. Şişli

# CGM prepares related Images , sounds or videos and upload them to each game step.

# CGM creates QR Codes and prints them.

# CGM prefers starting game with QR Codes and distributes QR Codes by using newspapers etc.  

# Players read QR Codes and get first clue.
